title: FL Author Who Opened Banned Books Store Makes 2024 Time 100 List | Flipboard
text: FL Author Who Opened Banned Books Store Makes 2024 Time 100 List Author Lauren Groff, who opened the banned books store, The Lynx, in FL, is among the most influential people in the world, Time said.
